actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1143.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #340 (359-7).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 2642 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Old Ninety-six Star Fort National Battlefield in the State of South Carolina.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1143) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire 1,120 acres in South Carolina to establish the Old Ninety Six National Historic Site. Authorizes the appropriation of $320,000 for such purpose, and of $500,000 for the development of essential public facilities at such site. Requires the Secretary to submit within two years to the Committees on Interior and Insular Affairs of the House and Senate a master plan for the development of such site.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Old Ninety-six Star Fort National Battlefield in the State of South Carolina.
